posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content: The build is quite nice but, it seems to me that Improved Expertise is somewhat excessive with this build. Perhaps you wanted to write "Improved Knockdown" instead? Secondly, unless you do have a use for that many skill points (heal 42?) you could lower your Intelligence to 14(16) and move those points to Charisma instead, Or a better idea is to find 2 more points and raise your Strength to 20(40). Lastly, even though this build has 26 levels of Bard, I do not see "still spell" in there, do you not plan on casting Wounding Whispers or War Cry with her? Those are some powerful spells.

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
@Valerfor, he has only 20 Bard, not 26.

I have heard that Bard 16 is the sweet spot for the Song, so I suggest going Bard 16 / Fighter 14 / RDD 10. Lower your INT like Valerfor said, and then you could use 3 of those skill points to start with 17 STR, and the 1 remaining point could go in either DEX (my choice) or CON or WIS. Use the 2 additional Fighter feats for Epic Prowess and Devastating Critical, freeing up a general feat for another Great STR, so you would end with 40 STR, and 2 more AB (1 from STR and 1 from Epic Prowess). You should be able to get high enough Perform for the level 16 Bard Song without needing to depend on gear.
